# Hunting Mutants
The Zone is home to many dangerous creatures. A skilled stalker can turn these threats into valuable resources.
## What You Need
Any [color=yellow]sharp weapon[/color] can butcher a dead mutant. A hunting knife is faster than most blades.
## How to Butcher
[bullet] Kill the mutant
[bullet] Equip a knife or sharp weapon
[bullet] Click the corpse with knife to butcher
[bullet] Wait for the process to complete
[bullet] Collect what drops
## What to Expect
Butchering mutants can yield [color=yellow]meat[/color], [color=yellow]mutant parts[/color], and [color=yellow]hides[/color]. What you get depends on what you hunt.
[bullet] Meat can be cooked for food
[bullet] Parts are used in crafting or sold to traders
[bullet] Hides can be processed into materials for armor
## A Word of Caution
Not all mutants are equal. Some are slow and manageable. Others are fast, invisible, or deadly in ways you won't expect. Learn what you're hunting before you engage.
[italic]The Zone rewards those who prepare.[/italic]
